generic.title: Generic
generic.description: A list of API functions for base scripting.

print.title: Print
print.description: To print a string to the console

getpluginstate.title: GetPluginState
getpluginstate.description: Returns the state of a plugin

commands.title: Commands
commands.description: A list of API functions for commands.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Commands system you need the following code in your plugin.

register.title: Register
register.description: To register a command you need to use the following syntax

additional.cpp:
The callback has the following arguments:
```cpp
void COMMAND_FUNCTION(int playerID, const char **args, uint32_t argsCount, bool silent)
```
additional.lua:
The callback has the following arguments:
```lua
cb(playerid --[[ number ]], args --[[ table ]], argsCount --[[ number ]], silent --[[ boolean as number ]])
```

unregister.title: Unregister
unregister.description: Unregisters a registered command using Swiftly Commands.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: A list of API functions for configuration files.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Configuration system you need the following code in your plugin.
getting-started.additional:
# Configuration Files

To use Swiftly Configuration system you need to create a `JSON` file in `addons/swiftly/configs/plugins` folder with the following schema:

#### File Name

```
MAIN_CONFIG_KEY.json
```

reload.title: Reload
reload.description: Reloads the configuration for the specified key.

fetcharraysize.title: FetchArraySize
fetcharraysize.description: Returns the array size of a config value.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 If the key is invalid or the key is not an array key, it returns 0.
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 If the key is invalid or the key is not an array key, it returns 0.
:::

fetch.title: Fetch
fetch.description: Returns the configuration value for the specified key.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 If the key is invalid or the key is not an array key, it returns 0.
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 If the key is invalid or the key is not an array key, it returns 0.
:::

exists.title: Exists
exists.description: Returns if the configuration key exists.

convars.title: Convars
convars.description: A list of API functions for convars.

database.title: Database
database.description: A list of API functions for database usage.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Database system you need the following code in your plugin.

escapestring.title: Escape String
escapestring.description: Returns a safe string which can be used in MySQL Query.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 If database is not connected it will return the same value 
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 If database is not connected it will return the same value 
:::

isconnected.title: IsConnected
isconnected.description: Returns if the database is connected or not.

query.title: Query
query.description: Returns a Database Query Result which can be used to iterate trough the return values.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 If database is not connected it will return an empty value. 
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 If database is not connected it will return an empty value. 
:::
### Parsing table
To parse the table you need to create a for iteration for parsing each row.
```lua
events:on("OnClientConnect", function(playerid)
    local player = GetPlayer(playerid)
    if not player then return false end

    local result = db:Query(string.format("select * from users where steamid = '%.0f'", player:GetSteamID()))
    for i=1,#result do
        print(json.encode(result[i])) -- prints the row with index i
    end
    return true
end)
```

fetchfields.title: FetchFields
fetchfields.description: Returns all the fields fetched by the query.

fetchvalue.title: FetchValue
fetchvalue.description: Returns the value of the specified field.

entities.title: Entities
entities.description: A list of API functions for entity management.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Entity system you need the following code in your plugin.

getentityids.title: GetEntityIDs
getentityids.description: Returns a list of all entity ids present on server.

getentities.title: GetEntities
getentities.description: Returns a list of all entities present on server.

fetch.title: Fetch
fetch.description: Fetches an entity on server based on Entity ID received from the entity.

destroy.title: Destroy
destroy.description: Removes an entity from server based on it's id.

additional.lua:
:::note
A list of the entity class names can be found here: [https://cs2.poggu.me/dumped-data/entity-list](https://cs2.poggu.me/dumped-data/entity-list).
As a class name it can also be used the following class name format to select a player: "player:PLAYERID", where PLAYERID is the player id.
:::
additional.cpp:
:::note
A list of the entity class names can be found here: [https://cs2.poggu.me/dumped-data/entity-list](https://cs2.poggu.me/dumped-data/entity-list).
As a class name it can also be used the following class name format to select a player: "player:PLAYERID", where PLAYERID is the player id.
:::

entity.title: Entity
entity.description: A list of API functions for Entity.

acceptinput.title: AcceptInput
acceptinput.description: Sends an input to the entity.

additional.cpp:
:::note
The activator and caller needs to be an entity or a player.
To specify a player you need to use "player:ID", where the ID is the player id.
To specify an entity you need to use "entity:ID", where the ID is the entity id.
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
The activator and caller needs to be an entity or a player.
To specify a player you need to use "player:ID", where the ID is the player id.
To specify an entity you need to use "entity:ID", where the ID is the entity id.
:::

setmodel.title: SetModel
setmodel.description: Sets the model of the entity.

setcollisiongroup.title: SetCollisionGroup
setcollisiongroup.description: Sets the collision group for the entity.

angles.title: Angles
angles.description: A list of function to manipulate an entity angles.

get.title: Get
get.description: Returns the angles of an entity.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the angles of an entity.

coords.title: Coords
coords.description: A list of function to manipulate an entity coords.

get.title: Get
get.description: Returns the coords of an entity.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the coords of an entity.

color.title: Colors
color.description: A list of function to manipulate an entity colors.

get.title: Get
get.description: Returns the colors of an entity.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the colors of an entity.

exports.title: Exports
exports.description: A list of API functions for exports.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Exports system you need the following code in your plugin.

call.title: Call
call.description: To call an export you need the plugin name and the export name.

export.title: Export
export.description: Exports a function so that it can be called from other plugins.

files.title: Files
files.description: A list of API functions for files.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Files system you need the following code in your plugin.

append.title: Append
append.description: Appends the content to a file

existspath.title: ExistsPath
existspath.description: Returns if the path exists or not

fetchdirectories.title: FetchDirectories
fetchdirectories.description: Returns a list of all the directories in a directory.

fetchfilenames.title: FetchFileNames
fetchfilenames.description: Returns a list of all the file names in a directory.

getbase.title: GetBase
getbase.description: Returns the base path of a file

isdirectory.title: IsDirectory
isdirectory.description: Returns if the path is a directory or not

read.title: Read
read.description: Reads the content of a file

write.title: Write
write.description: Writes the content to a file

gameevents.title: Game Events
gameevents.description: A list of game events provided by Swiftly API.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Game Events system you need the following code in your plugin.

additional.cpp:
:::warning
 This include needs to exist only in one source code file. 
:::

onbombabortdefuse.title: BombAbortDefuse
onbombabortdefuse.description: This game event is called when a bomb is not being defused anymore.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::

onbombabortplant.title: BombAbortPlant
onbombabortplant.description: This game event is called when a bomb is not being planted anymore.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::

onbombbeginplant.title: BombBeginPlant
onbombbeginplant.description: This game event is called when a bomb is being planted.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::

onbombbegindefuse.title: BombBeginDefuse
onbombbegindefuse.description: This game event is called when a bomb is being defused.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::

onbombdefused.title: BombDefused
onbombdefused.description: This game event is called when a bomb has been defused.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN 
:::

onbombdropped.title: BombDropped
onbombdropped.description: This game event is called when a bomb was dropped.

onbombpickup.title: BombPickup
onbombpickup.description: This game event is called when a bomb was picked up.

onbombexploded.title: BombExploded
onbombexploded.description: This game event is called when a bomb exploded.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 site can take 3 values: SITE_A, SITE_B or SITE_UNKNOWN

:::

logs.title: Logs
logs.description: A list of API functions for logging.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Logging system you need the following code in your plugin.

write.title: Write
write.description: Writes a log in log files.

menus.title: Menus
menus.description: A list of API functions for menus.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Menu system you need the following code in your plugin.

register.title: RegisterMenu
register.description: Writes a log in log files.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 The color needs to be a hex string by the model RRGGBB.

Example: 344CEB 
:::

:::warning
 The options needs to be a pair of strings
```cpp
{
    { "option 1", "value 1"},
    {"option 2", "value 2"},
    // ...
}
```
The value can be replaced with a command from Swiftly and it's arguments, or it can be replaced with a menu id to open another menu.

The value can be also a blank string to not execute anything when it's selected. 
:::
additional.lua:
:::note
 The color needs to be a hex string by the model RRGGBB.

Example: 344CEB 
:::

:::warning
 The options needs to be a pair of strings
```lua
{
    { "option 1", "value 1"},
    {"option 2", "value 2"},
    -- ...
}
```
The value can be replaced with a command from Swiftly and it's arguments, or it can be replaced with a menu id to open another menu.

The value can be also a blank string to not execute anything when it's selected. 
:::

unregister.title: UnregisterMenu
unregister.description:
Unregistered a menu by the specified id.
:::note
 It can unregister only the menus which were created from the inside of the plugin. 
:::

http.title: HTTP
http.description: A list of API functions for HTTP.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly HTTP system you need the following code in your plugin.

generaterequest.title: GenerateRequest
generaterequest.description: Returns an HTTP Request handler to work with.

request.title: HTTP Request
request.description: A list of API functions for HTTP Requests.

addmultipartfile.title: AddMultipartFile
addmultipartfile.description: Adds a multipart file to the request.

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: Executes a DELETE HTTP Request with the settings previously set.

deleteheader.title: DeleteHeader
deleteheader.description: Deletes a specific header from request.

get.title: Get
get.description: Executes a GET HTTP Request with the settings previously set.

geterror.title: GetError
geterror.description: Returns the request error if it encountered an internal error.

patch.title: Patch
patch.description: Executes a PATCH HTTP Request with the settings previously set.

post.title: Post
post.description: Executes a POST HTTP Request with the settings previously set.

put.title: Put
put.description: Executes a PUT HTTP Request with the settings previously set.

setbasicauthentication.title: SetBasicAuthentication
setbasicauthentication.description: Sets the Bearer Authorization header in request.

setbearerauthenticationtoken.title: SetBearerAuthenticationToken
setbearerauthenticationtoken.description: Sets the Bearer Authorization header in request.

setbody.title: SetBody
setbody.description: Sets the body of the request.

setcontenttype.title: SetContentType
setcontenttype.description: Sets the Content Type of the request.

setfollowredirect.title: SetFollowRedirect
setfollowredirect.description: Sets the follow redirect for domains. Default is enabled.

player.title: Player
player.description: A list of API functions for a player.

generic.title: Generic
generic.description: A list of base function to execute on player.

drop.title: Drop
drop.description: Disconnects a player from the server.

setchattagcolor.title: SetChatTagColor
setchattagcolor.description: Sets the player chat tag color.

setgloves.title: SetGloves
setgloves.description: Sets the gloves to a player.

executecommand.title: ExecuteCommand
executecommand.description: Executes a command in player's console.

sethealthshotboosteffectexpirationtime.title: SetHealthShotBoostEffectExpirationTime
sethealthshotboosteffectexpirationtime.description: Sets the health shot effect expiration time.

additional.lua:
:::note
 The expiretime needs to be the form of server:GetCurrentTime() + Duration. 
:::
additional.cpp:
:::note
 The expiretime needs to be the form of server->GetCurrentTime() + Duration. 
:::

getconnectedtime.title: GetConnectedTime
getconnectedtime.description: Returns the connected time of the player in seconds.

getconvarvalue.title: GetConvarValue
getconvarvalue.description: Returns a convar value as a string.

setconvar.title: SetConvar
setconvar.description: Sets a convar value to a client.

getlatency.title: GetLatency
getlatency.description: Returns the latency (ping) of a player.

hidemenu.title: HideMenu
hidemenu.description: Hides the menu for a player.

isfakeclient.title: IsFakeClient

isfirstspawn.title: IsFirstSpawn

sendmsg.title: SendMsg
sendmsg.description: Sends a message to a player.

showmenu.title: ShowMenu
showmenu.description: Shows the menu for a player.

set.title: Set

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: A list of function to manipulate a players speed.

get.title: Get
get.description: Returns the speed of a player.

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the speed of a player.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: A list of function to manipulate a player variables.

get.title: Get
get.description: Returns the value of a variable.

additional.cpp:
:::warning
 If the data type is not correct, the value returned will be 0. 
:::

set.title: Set
set.description: Sets the value of a variable.

additional.cpp:
:::warning
 If the data type is not supported, it will not be set. 
:::
additional.lua:
:::warning
 If the data type is not supported, it will not be set. 
:::

weapons.title: Weapons
weapons.description: A list of function to manipulate a player weapons.

weapon.title: Weapon
weapon.description: A list of functions to manipulate a player weapon.

getsilencertype.title: GetSilencerType
getsilencertype.description: Returns the silencer type of the weapon.

getnextprimaryattacktick.title: GetNextPrimaryAttackTick
getnextprimaryattacktick.description: Returns the next primary attack tick.

getnextsecondaryattacktick.title: GetNextSecondaryAttackTick
getnextsecondaryattacktick.description: Returns the next secondary attack tick.

setnextprimaryattacktick.title: SetNextPrimaryAttackTick
setnextprimaryattacktick.description: Sets the next primary attack tick.

setnextsecondaryattacktick.title: SetNextSecondaryAttackTick
setnextsecondaryattacktick.description: Sets the next secondary attack tick.

getnextprimaryattacktickratio.title: GetNextPrimaryAttackTickRatio
getnextprimaryattacktickratio.description: Returns the next primary attack tick ratio.

getnextsecondaryattacktickratio.title: GetNextSecondaryAttackTickRatio
getnextsecondaryattacktickratio.description: Returns the next secondary attack tick ratio.

setnextprimaryattacktickratio.title: SetNextPrimaryAttackTickRatio
setnextprimaryattacktickratio.description: Sets the next primary attack tick ratio.

setnextsecondaryattacktickratio.title: SetNextSecondaryAttackTickRatio
setnextsecondaryattacktickratio.description: Sets the next secondary attack tick ratio.

exists.title: Exists
exists.description: Returns if the weapon exists in the players weapons list or not.

getname.title: GetName
getname.description: Returns the name of a weapon.

getpaintkit.title: GetPaintKit
getpaintkit.description: Returns the paint kit of a weapon.

getseed.title: GetSeed
getseed.description: Returns the seed of a weapon.

getstattrack.title: GetStatTrack
getstattrack.description: Returns the StatTrack of a weapon.

gettype.title: GetType
gettype.description: Returns the type of a weapon.

getwear.title: GetWear
getwear.description: Returns the wear of a weapon.

setdefaultchangeskinattributes.title: SetDefaultChangeSkinAttributes
setdefaultchangeskinattributes.description: Sets the default change skin attributes.

setpaintkit.title: SetPaintKit
setpaintkit.description: Sets paint kit to a weapon.

setseed.title: SetSeed
setseed.description: Sets a seed to a weapon.

dropweapons.title: DropWeapons
dropweapons.description: Drops the weapons of a player.

getweapon.title: GetWeapon
getweapon.description: Returns the weapon of a player with the specified id.

getweaponfromstop.title: GetWeaponFromSlot
getweaponfromstop.description: Returns the weapon of a player for the specified slot.

giveweapon.title: GiveWeapons
giveweapon.description: Gives a weapon to a player.

removeweapons.title: RemoveWeapons
removeweapons.description: Removes the weapons of a player.

playermanager.title: Player Manager
playermanager.description: A list of API functions for player manager.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: You need the following code in your plugin.
getting-started.additional:
:::warning
 This is mandatory code in every plugin main entry file. 
:::

getplayer.title: GetPlayer
getplayer.description: Returns the player at specified slot.

getplayercap.title: GetPlayerCap
getplayercap.description: Returns the maximum amount of players on server.

getplayercount.title: GetPlayerCount
getplayercount.description: Returns the number of players on server.

sendmsg.title: SendMsg
sendmsg.description: Sends a message to all the connected players.

precacher.title: Precacher
precacher.description: A list of API functions for precaching files.

server.title: Server
server.description: A list of API functions for server.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Server system you need the following code in your plugin.

getcurrenttime.title: GetCurrentTime
getcurrenttime.description: Returns the current global time of the server.

gettickcount.title: GetTickCount
gettickcount.description: Returns the current tick count of the server.

ispistolround.title: IsPistolRound
ispistolround.description: Checks if the round is a PistolRound.

executecommand.title: ExecuteCommand
executecommand.description: To execute a command in server console you need to use this function.

getmaxplayers.title: GetMaxPlayers
getmaxplayers.description: Returns the maximum amount of players which can fit on server.

ismapvalid.title: IsMapValid
ismapvalid.description: Returns if the map name is valid or not.

precacher.title: Precacher
precacher.description: A list of API functions for precaching files.

convars.title: Convars
convars.description: A list of API functions for convars.

getconvarbool.title: GetConvarBool
getconvarbool.description: Returns the convar value if it's a boolean type convar.

getconvarfloat.title: GetConvarFloat
getconvarfloat.description: Returns the convar value if it's a float type convar.

getconvarint.title: GetConvarInt
getconvarint.description: Returns the convar value if it's an integer type convar.

getconvarstring.title: GetConvarString
getconvarstring.description: Returns the convar value if it's a string type convar.

getconvaruint.title: GetConvarUInt
getconvaruint.description: Returns the convar value if it's an unsigned integer type convar.

timers.title: Timers
timers.description: A list of API functions for timers.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use the Swiftly Timers system you need the following code in your plugin.

pause.title: Pause
pause.description: To pause a timer you need to specify it's Timer ID from when it was created.

create.title: Register
create.description: To register a timer you need to create a function and specity a delay to it when you register the timer.

additional.cpp:
:::note
 The function argument also supports lambda function ( \[]\{ ... } ). 
:::

unpause.title: Unpause
unpause.description: To unpause a timer you need to specify it's Timer ID from when it was created.

delete.title: Unregister
delete.description: To unregister a timer you need to specify it's Timer ID from when it was created.

translation.title: Translation
translation.description: A list of API functions for translation files.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: To use Swiftly Translation system you need to create a `JSON` file in `translations` folder with the following schema:

content.cpp:
#### File Name
```
translation.MAIN_TRANSLATION_KEY.json
```

#### File Content
```json
{
    "key1.key2": {
        "en": "English Translation",
        "ro": "Traducere Romn"
    },
    ...
}
```
content.lua:
#### File Name
```
translation.MAIN_TRANSLATION_KEY.json
```

#### File Content
```json
{
    "key1.key2": {
        "en": "English Translation",
        "ro": "Traducere Romn"
    },
    ...
}
```

fetch.title: Fetch
fetch.description:
Returns the translation for the specified key.
:::warning
 If the translation key is non-existent for the specified language in core.json, it returns the the translation key. :::
:::note

 Key Format: MAIN_TRANSLATION_KEY.TRANSLATION_KEY

Example: test_plugin.core.started :::
